pageContext.claim: “I've always said, who are we killing ISIS for? You know, the worst enemy of Russia, Iran, syria, you look at it, is ISIS. So we're killing ISIS for people that aren't necessarily always in agreement with us, let’s put it that way.”
pageContext.analysis: The United States went into Syria to attack ISIS in order to deny it a safe haven from which the terror group could launch attacks and also to prevent it from destabilizing Iraq.
